text: Jin logon ko Allah ne apne fazal se nawaza hai aur phir woh bukhl (kanjoosi/niggardly) se kaam lete hain woh is khayal mein na rahein ke yeh bakheeli unke liye acchi hai. Nahin, yeh unke haqq mein nihayat buri hai, Jo kuch woh apni kanjoosi se jamaa kar rahey hain wahi qayamat ke roz unke galey ka tauq ban jayega. Zameen aur asmaano ki miras Allah hi ke liye hai aur tum jo kuch karte ho Allah ussey bakhabar hai
